[++Cool Codes++]

[Flappy Copter - Mode Switcher]
DD000000 00000010
D3000000 30000000
20453CE4 00000000
D2000000 00000000
D3000000 09000000
20800E9C 00000000
D2000000 00000000
DD000000 00000020
D3000000 30000000
20453CE4 00000001
D2000000 00000000
D3000000 09000000
20800E9C 00000001
D2000000 00000000
DD000000 00000080
D3000000 08000000
20859C70 08000001
D3000000 30000000
20453CE4 00000001
D2000000 00000000
D3000000 09000000
D3000000 09000000
20800E9C 00000001
D2000000 00000000
{DPad Left = Normal Mode, DPad Right = Hard Mode, DPad Down = Practice Mode. *Will activate a splash screen when DPad Left or Down is pressed outside of the Flappy Copter minigame. DPad Right to clear screen if this happens.*}

[Wood Ninja - Mode Switcher]
DD000000 00000020
D3000000 30000000
20478A14 00000001
D2000000 00000000
D3000000 30000000
DD000000 00000010
20478A14 00000000
D2000000 00000000
D3000000 30000000
DD000000 00000080
20478A14 00000001
D3000000 00000000
2041901C 00000001
D2000000 00000000
DD000000 00000040
D3000000 30000000
20478A14 00000001
2047B270 00000001
2047D104 00000001
D2000000 00000000
{DPad Left = Normal Mode, DPad Right = Hard Mode, DPad Up = Logo Mode, DPad Down = Practice Mode. *Will activate a splash screen when DPad Left, Up, or Down is pressed outside of the Wood Ninja minigame. DPad Right to clear screen if this happens.*}

[Paused Screen Overlay]
D3000000 30000000
20396B70 00000001
208067B5 00000000
D2000000 00000000
{You will now forever see the pause screen.}

[Disable Flappy Copter]
D3000000 08000000
20859C70 00000000
D2000000 00000000
{You can't play your favorite worst ISZ Minigame now.}

[Disable Messaging App]
D3000000 00000000
00429F40 00000001
D2000000 00000000
D3000000 40000000
00419B44 00000001
D2000000 00000000
D3000000 0F000000
00FFF890 00000001
D2000000 00000000
{Can't date anybody online now, can you?}

[Disable Pause Button]
D3000000 30000000
20396B70 00000000
208067B5 00000000
D2000000 00000000
{You can't edit your settings. Yeah this cheat is actually 100% useless.}

[Disable Wood Ninja]
D3000000 00000000
2041901C 00000000
D2000000 00000000
